title: Beyond the frame (TEFC)
creator_credit: Royal College of Art (Great Britain), Tate Gallery and B.Z. Vincent-Batyka
brief_description: In attempting to break down the barriers between art galleries and the general public, the Tate Gallery gives lectures to groups of adults and is involved in a special program for children, called Kid’s Play, to help them appreciate the different types and forms of art.
creator_credit_for_label: Royal College of Art (Great Britain), Tate Gallery and B.Z. Vincent-Batyka
